    Portfolio

    My projects:

    3D-Printed Hydroponic Tower

    A 3D-printed tower and a home depot bucket to create a suitable system for growing vegatables

    Agendly

    Using AI to streamline adding events from syllabi, agendas, and schedules to your calendar

    DIY Aquaponics Systems

    A combination of a Fish Tank, PVC pipe structures, and custom 3D-Printed parts to create an Ebb and Flow Aquaponics System

    FRC 2023

    Axiom 4787 Robot for the First Robotics Competition

    HomeLab (Home server)

    Repurposed my old desktop into a homelab for the purpose of hosting my different services

    Syringe Pump Project

    A project for our DF 2100 class at Vanderbilt University that focuses on precisely controlling the dispensing of liquids for medical uses

    Ukulele

    CAD out a ukulele for it to be laser cut and assembled

    Î¼Fluidic Device

    A project for our CHBE 4200 class at Vanderbilt University that focuses on sorting different small particles with no moving parts
